DOC.brief_summary: The standard treatment of anal fissure in the netherlands (ISDN ointment) is being compared to a relatively new treatment (injection of Botox in the internal anal sphincter). The study hypothesis is that after 4 months, Botox has healed more patients than ISDN. The comparison is done blinded for the surgeon and the patient.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Treatment Success of Botox Injection in the Internal Sphincter Versus Isosorbidedinitrate Ointment in Patients With an Anal Fissure
DOC.criteria: all consecutive patients over the age of 18 with a chronic anal fissure presenting to our surgical outpatient clinic pregnancy previous anal surgery Crohn's disease systemic causes of an anal fissure
